name: Reset Post Password
author: Sebastian Pisula

sections.description:
Plugin can be used to automaticlly reset password of password protected pages, posts or custom post types. After activating plugin you will see new option in publish section of posts. Set post visibility to password protected. Next you can choose how often password will be reset. Interval is expressed in days (minimum 1).

New password is sent to website administrator (Settings -> General -> Email Address).
sections.installation:
Install like any other plugin, directly from your plugins page or upload the files manually to your server.

Plugin doesn’t require any configuration.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Install like any other plugin, directly from your plugins page or upload the files manually to your server.

Plugin doesn’t require any configuration.

short_description: Reset post or page password automatically after X days.
